          <title>
            <string language="en">The exploding hydrogen balloon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der explodierende Wasserstoffballon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le ballon éclatant d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O balão explodindo do hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'aerostato d'esplosione dell'idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το μπαλόνι υδρογόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El globo del hidrógeno que estalla</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a hydrogen balloon (left) and a lighted wax taper attached to a metre rule (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balloon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">burning</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einen Wasserstoffballon 
(nach links) und einen beleuchteten Wachskegelzapfen, der zu einer 
Meßinstrumentrichtlinie angebracht wird (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un ballon d'hydrogène 
(à gauche) et un cône allumé de cire attaché à une règle de 
mètre (droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um balão do hidrogênio 
(à esquerda) e um atarraxamento iluminado da cera unido a uma régua 
do medidor (direita).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un aerostato 
dell'idrogeno (a sinistra) e un cono illuminato della cera fissato ad 
una regola del tester (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει ένα μπαλόνι υδρογόνου 
(αριστερά) και αναμμένη κωνικότητα κεριών που συνδέεται με έναν 
κανόνα μέτρου (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un globo del hidrógeno
(a la izquierda) y un ahusamiento encendido de la cera asociado a una 
regla del contador (derecha).</string>
          </description>
